content.en: Freeway incident detection: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms, including neural network models, for improving the detection of incidents on freeways. These algorithms, such as artificial neural networks, Bayesian-based neural networks, and Fuzzy ART neural networks, are being investigated for their effectiveness in detecting and predicting traffic incidents. The goal is to enhance the universality and transferability of freeway incident detection systems, ultimately improving the overall efficiency and safety of transportation systems.
content.da: Motorvejs-incidentdetektion: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, herunder neurale netværksmodeller, for at forbedre detektionen af hændelser på motorveje. Disse algoritmer, såsom kunstige neurale netværk, bayesiansk-baserede neurale netværk og Fuzzy ART-neurale netværk, bliver undersøgt for deres effektivitet i at detektere og forudsige trafikulykker. Målet er at forbedre universaliteten og overførbarheden af motorvejs-incidentdetektionssystemer, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer transportssystemernes samlede effektivitet og sikkerhed.
